Sql.query: SELECT * FROM CAM_CENEOLIHOJAADET WHERE CENTRALACODI =:CENTRALACODI AND IND_DEL= :IND_DEL ORDER BY CENTRALADETCODI DESC

INSERT INTO CAM_CENEOLIHOJAADET ( CENTRALADETCODI, CENTRALACODI, SPEED, ACCIONA, USU_CREACION, FEC_CREACION, IND_DEL ) VALUES ( :CENTRALADETCODI, :CENTRALACODI, :SPEED, :ACCIONA, :USU_CREACION, :FEC_CREACION, :IND_DEL )
SELECT * FROM CAM_CENEOLIHOJAADET ORDER BY CENTRALADETCODI DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY

UPDATE CAM_CENEOLIHOJAADET SET IND_DEL = :IND_DEL, USU_MODIFICACION = :USU_MODIFICACION, FEC_MODIFICACION = :FEC_MODIFICACION WHERE CENTRALACODI IN (SELECT CENTRALACODI FROM CAM_CENEOLIHOJAA WHERE PROYCODI = :PROYCODI AND IND_DEL='0') AND IND_DEL='0'
SELECT * FROM CAM_CENEOLIHOJAADET WHERE PROYCODI = :ID AND IND_DEL = :IND_DEL
